Description: The measurement system should (S5) record all power outages (in 1-, 2- or 3-phases) in a measurement unit that is longer than 3 minutes.
Software in the meter (except metrological software) and communication device should be upgradeable from HES.
The report should be able to extract status-marked data from HES (S102) and present it in a way that makes it easy to understand. Example all measure data with specfic status
